description: Paracetamol is a pain reliever and a fever reducer.
howToUse: Take with water. Can be taken with or without food.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature, away from moisture and heat.
warnings: Do not exceed 4g per day. Overdose can lead to severe liver damage.

description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation.
howToUse: Take with food or milk to prevent stomach upset.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from light.
warnings: Long-term use can increase the risk of heart attack or stroke.

description: Aspirin is used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation and is also used as a blood thinner.
howToUse: Take with a full glass of water.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat.
warnings: Do not give to children with viral infections due to Reye's syndrome risk.

description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.
howToUse: Take once daily with or without food.
precautions: Avoid in severe liver or kidney disease
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: May cause drowsiness; avoid driving or operating heavy machinery.

description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
howToUse: Take with or without food. Continue taking even if you feel better.
precautions: Inform your doctor of any allergies
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place.
warnings: Complete the full course to prevent antibiotic resistance.

description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor that decreases stomach acid.
howToUse: Take before meals, usually in the morning.
precautions: Long-term use may lead to vitamin B12 deficiency
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: Do not crush or chew the tablets; swallow them whole.

description: Loratadine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural histamine in the body.
howToUse: Take once daily with or without food.
precautions: Consult doctor if you have liver or kidney disease
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: May cause drowsiness; avoid driving or operating heavy machinery.

description: Metformin is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels.
howToUse: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture and heat.
warnings: May cause lactic acidosis; monitor blood sugar regularly.

description: Losartan is an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) used to treat high blood pressure.
howToUse: Take once daily with or without food.
precautions: Avoid in severe kidney or liver disease
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: Do not use if pregnant; may cause harm to an unborn baby.

description: Levothyroxine is a synthetic form of the thyroid hormone used to treat hypothyroidism.
howToUse: Take on an empty stomach, 30 minutes before breakfast.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from light.
warnings: Do not switch brands without consulting your doctor.

description: Atorvastatin is a statin used to lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood.
howToUse: Take once daily, with or without food.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture and light.
warnings: Monitor liver function regularly; may cause muscle damage.

description: Clopidogrel is an antiplatelet medication that prevents blood clots.
howToUse: Take once daily with or without food.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: May increase bleeding risk; avoid unnecessary trauma.

description: Simvastatin is a statin used to lower cholesterol and triglycerides.
howToUse: Take once daily in the evening.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture and light.
warnings: Monitor liver function; risk of muscle damage.

description: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
howToUse: Take once daily in the morning with or without food.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: May cause electrolyte imbalance; monitor blood pressure regularly.

description: Gabapentin is used to treat nerve pain and seizures.
howToUse: Take with or without food, usually three times a day.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: May cause drowsiness; avoid driving or operating heavy machinery.

description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
howToUse: Take once daily with or without food.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from light.
warnings: May cause low blood pressure; monitor blood pressure regularly.

description: Metoprolol is a beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure, angina, and heart failure.
howToUse: Take with or immediately after meals.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from light and moisture.
warnings: Do not stop abruptly; may worsen heart problems.

description: Pantoprazole is a proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid.
howToUse: Take before meals, usually in the morning.
precautions: Long-term use may lead to vitamin B12 deficiency
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: Do not crush or chew tablets; swallow whole.

description: Prednisone is a corticosteroid used to treat inflammation and immune-related conditions.
howToUse: Take with food to reduce stomach upset.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: Long-term use can lead to bone loss; taper off slowly.

description: Ranitidine is an H2 blocker that reduces stomach acid production.
howToUse: Take with or without food, usually once or twice daily.
precautions: Monitor kidney function in long-term use
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from moisture.
warnings: Do not use with other acid-reducing medications without doctorâ€™s advice.
